page.title: 10An electronics technician
page.content: Richard Lowis,an electronics technician Rumbelows Boston he mends televisions,videos,computers,stereos. Quaifications to have for the job is City and guilds,radio servicing,city guilds mono servicing,city guilds video recording and play back servicing.In his profession they have frequency counter,digital level probe, digital level meter,signal generator 19staff 14technicians 1manager 2secretaries 1debt collector.They have 2 apprentices.5 week a year holiday Mostly repairs videos.Cable television will increase his workload.
